Detailed Description

Base class for storage device visitors.

Class StorageDeviceVisitor implements an operation which shall be executed on certain filtered storage devices actually registered with the root file system. The static method StorageDeviceIterator::Accept() takes a storage device visitor and in case all the relevant storage devices are ready it accepts the visitor and calls its method Visit() on every storage device gathered using a storage device iterator initialized with the filter defined in the storage device visitor. This implements the visitor pattern.

virtual BOOLEAN StorageDeviceVisitor::Visit (  const StorageDevicePtr &  device  )  [pure virtual]
 

Visits device and performs its operation on it. The return value indicates if the visiting shall continue or shall be aborted.

Field Documentation
